title: Fragment, mid–late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: 7 &1 satin damask. Warp float face of satin as background.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 11.5 x 42 cm (4 1/2 x 16 9/16 in.); weft is selvage to selvage.
Repeat H: 41 cm (16 1/8 in.)
description: Vertically symmetrical pattern of finely drawn flowers and foliage. Color: off-white.
